Html: I wanted to inquire if there are plans to release a version of PRISM that uses the latest 2.0 version of Unity.

Hi,

The current release already uses Unity version 2.0. You can find more information about this in these blog posts from Bob Brumfield:

  • Prism Source Updated for Unity 2.0 and Silverlight 4
  • Prism V2.2 Posted to Codeplex

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
